String.Source: How did you manage to get past the soul-snare?
String.Dest: 你是怎么通过灵魂陷阱的？

String.Source: My queen, I will do my best not to let you down.
String.Dest: 我的女王，我将会竭尽全力不要让你失望。

String.Source: My queen, I will do my best not to let you down.
String.Dest: 我的女王，我将会竭尽全力不要让你失望。

String.Source: Have you spoken with Ysgramor?
String.Dest: 你与伊斯格拉谟谈过了吗？

String.Source: Why does everyone here speak strangely?
String.Dest: 為什麼大家都在這裡都說些奇奇怪怪的話？

String.Source: Why does everyone here speak strangely?
String.Dest: 為什麼大家都在這裡都說些奇奇怪怪的話？

String.Source: Why does everyone here speak strangely?
String.Dest: 為什麼大家都在這裡都說些奇奇怪怪的話？

String.Source: In any case, it was good to see you once more, my queen.
String.Dest: 很高兴能再次见到你，我的女皇。

String.Source: In any case, it was good to see you once more, my queen.
String.Dest: 很高兴能再次见到你，我的女皇。

String.Source: In any case, it was good to see you once more, my queen.
String.Dest: 很高兴能再次见到你，我的女皇。

String.Source: I don't understand how bitter enemies can be cordial.
String.Dest: [我不清楚敌人要厉害成什么样才会让我兴奋。]

String.Source: It was good to see you as well, my champion.
String.Dest: 很高兴见到你，我的勇士。

String.Source: You may not recognize me now that I have flesh, but I am Iorel, who was once a Draugr, and before that a queen.
String.Dest: 你也许现在不认识我，毕竟我的肉体已经是这个样子了。但我是柔落, 一个曾经的尸鬼，在那之前是一名女王。

String.Source: The Dov-Rha knew a word that could part the clouds and save the sun. I was fortunate to have known it on this day.
String.Dest: 这个多瓦知道，一个单词就能吹散乌云，露出阳光。幸运的是我在那一天就已经知道了。

String.Source: Yet as much as it pains me not to celebrate our reunion, that day will have to wait.
String.Dest: 可是只要【不为我们的重逢而庆祝】，那一天就不会到来。

String.Source: But rather, for providing a simple act of kindness, a small flicker of warmth, at a time and a place when I needed it most.
String.Dest: 更值得记住的是，一个小小的善举，一丝闪现的温暖，在我最需要它的那一时一地。

String.Source: Argh!
String.Dest: 啊！

String.Source: However, I thought to dismiss with such custom, in the presence of an old friend.
String.Dest: 但是，在老朋友面前我想让这样的顾客离开。

String.Source: Hyargh!
String.Dest: 嘿呀！

String.Source: Perhaps in time, the fates will grant us another day, when there are no battles to fight, and no tears to shed.
String.Dest: 也许在某个时候，命运的三女神将会赐予我们崭新的一天，全无纷争，亦无泪水的世界

String.Source: Now, thanks to you, I am a queen once more.
String.Dest: 现在，幸赖你的帮助，我再一次登上女王之位。

String.Source: I too once spoke, in this honor-swathed prose, as usually custom is, in the realm of soul's end.
String.Dest: 我曾经说过，这种看似荣誉实则枯燥无聊的话语， 一般习惯上来讲，反应出了他枯竭的内心。

String.Source: Ah, it's you. My savior, my champion, to whom I am forever grateful.
String.Dest: 啊，是你。我的救主，我的勇士，我永远感激的人。

String.Source: One day, you will know it as well, but today is not that day. You have a world to save, and I wish you luck.
String.Dest: 总有一天，你会明白这件事的，但不是今天。你还有整个世界要去拯救呢，祝你好运。

String.Source: In the realm of eternity, anger is as pointless as a candle in the ocean. There is no room for rivalries, rudeness, or rancor. Only revelry.
String.Dest: 在永恒的领域中，愤怒就像是大海中的一支蜡烛一样毫无意义。这里没有敌意，粗鲁，或怨恨。这里只有狂欢。

String.Source: Agh!
String.Dest: 啊！

String.Source: Well, I'm glad someone here isn't a complete stranger.
String.Dest: 好吧，我很高兴这里有人不是完全的陌生人。

String.Source: Well, I'm glad someone here isn't a complete stranger.
String.Dest: 好吧，我很高兴这里有人不是完全的陌生人。

String.Source: Wait, I want to ask you a few more questions first.
String.Dest: 等等,我还有些问题要问.

String.Source: So you betrayed the Nedes. How many died at your hands?
String.Dest: 所以你背叛了Nedes。有多少人死在你的手上？

String.Source: That's enough translations.
String.Dest: 这么解答已经足够。

String.Source: Your skin looks a bit dry. You should speak to an alchemist.
String.Dest: 你的皮肤看起来有点干啊。你该去和一位炼金术士谈谈。

String.Source: Your skin looks a bit dry. You should speak to an alchemist.
String.Dest: 你的皮肤看起来有点干啊。你该去和一位炼金术士谈谈。

String.Source: Your skin looks a bit dry. You should speak to an alchemist.
String.Dest: 你的皮肤看起来有点干啊。你该去和一位炼金术士谈谈。

String.Source: They say Ysgramor established Saarthal.
String.Dest: 他们说 Ysgramor 建立了 Saarthal.

String.Source: They say Ysgramor established Saarthal.
String.Dest: 他们说 Ysgramor 建立了 Saarthal.

String.Source: Enough of your whining Draugr. I'm turning you into bonemeal.
String.Dest: 够了！你们这群呜呜叫的尸鬼，我要把你们打成骨粉。

String.Source: Enough of your whining Draugr. I'm turning you into bonemeal.
String.Dest: 够了！你们这群呜呜叫的尸鬼，我要把你们打成骨粉。

String.Source: Enough of your whining Draugr. I'm turning you into bonemeal.
String.Dest: 够了！你们这群呜呜叫的尸鬼，我要把你们打成骨粉。

String.Source: Look at you? Who would dare set their eyes upon such a hideous monster?
String.Dest: 看着你？谁敢看着这样可怕的怪物？

String.Source: Look at you? Who would dare set their eyes upon such a hideous monster?
String.Dest: 看着你？谁敢看着这样可怕的怪物？

String.Source: The Atmora worshiped dragons?
String.Dest: The Atmora 崇拜龙？

String.Source: The Atmora worshiped dragons?
String.Dest: The Atmora 崇拜龙？

String.Source: The Atmora worshiped dragons?
String.Dest: The Atmora 崇拜龙？

String.Source: Not a problem. I was going to kill you anyway.
String.Dest: 没问题！反正我早晚要弄死你。

String.Source: Not a problem. I was going to kill you anyway.
String.Dest: 没问题！反正我早晚要弄死你。

String.Source: Not a problem. I was going to kill you anyway.
String.Dest: 没问题！反正我早晚要弄死你。

String.Source: Not a problem. I was going to kill you anyway.
String.Dest: 没问题！反正我早晚要弄死你。

String.Source: Not a problem. I was going to kill you anyway.
String.Dest: 没问题！反正我早晚要弄死你。

String.Source: Ah, I know of this Elf.
String.Dest: 啊，我知道這個精靈。.

String.Source: Ah, I know of this Elf.
String.Dest: 啊，我知道這個精靈。.

String.Source: Ah, I know of this Elf.
String.Dest: 啊，我知道這個精靈。.

String.Source: Ah, I know of this Elf.
String.Dest: 啊，我知道這個精靈。.

String.Source: Do you know the phrase "Bolog Aaz, Mal Lir?"
String.Dest: 你知道"Bolog Aaz, Mal Lir?"这句古诺德语吗？

String.Source: The Merethic Era passed long ago. How are you still alive?
String.Dest: 这神秘的纪元已过去了很久，你怎么仍然活着?

String.Source: The Merethic Era passed long ago. How are you still alive?
String.Dest: 这神秘的纪元已过去了很久，你怎么仍然活着?

String.Source: The Merethic Era passed long ago. How are you still alive?
String.Dest: 这神秘的纪元已过去了很久，你怎么仍然活着?

String.Source: Who was this Mer the Frost Dragon lent his powers to?
String.Dest: 这位持有霜龙之力的精灵是谁？

String.Source: Who was this Mer the Frost Dragon lent his powers to?
String.Dest: 这位持有霜龙之力的精灵是谁？

String.Source: Who was this Mer the Frost Dragon lent his powers to?
String.Dest: 这位持有霜龙之力的精灵是谁？

String.Source: Who was this Mer the Frost Dragon lent his powers to?
String.Dest: 这位持有霜龙之力的精灵是谁？

String.Source: I apologize, but such a request goes against my principles.
String.Dest: 我很抱歉，但如此要求确实有悖于我的原则.

String.Source: I want to return to my earlier questions.
String.Dest: 我想回到我刚才的问题。

String.Source: There must be some record of your previous existence.
String.Dest: 关于你的前世一定有什么记载的。

String.Source: There must be some record of your previous existence.
String.Dest: 关于你的前世一定有什么记载的。

String.Source: There must be some record of your previous existence.
String.Dest: 关于你的前世一定有什么记载的。

String.Source: Very well.
String.Dest: 很好。

String.Source: Pure white and camouflaged in the snow. What happened next?
String.Dest: 穿的一身白然后隐藏在雪地里。接下来会发生什么？

String.Source: Pure white and camouflaged in the snow. What happened next?
String.Dest: 穿的一身白然后隐藏在雪地里。接下来会发生什么？

String.Source: Pure white and camouflaged in the snow. What happened next?
String.Dest: 穿的一身白然后隐藏在雪地里。接下来会发生什么？

String.Source: Pure white and camouflaged in the snow. What happened next?
String.Dest: 穿的一身白然后隐藏在雪地里。接下来会发生什么？

String.Source: Why is that?
String.Dest: 那是怎么一回事？

String.Source: Why is that?
String.Dest: 那是怎么一回事？

String.Source: Why is that?
String.Dest: 那是怎么一回事？

String.Source: Why is that?
String.Dest: 那是怎么一回事？

String.Source: It will be my honor.
String.Dest: 这将是我的荣幸。

String.Source: It will be my honor.
String.Dest: 这将是我的荣幸。

String.Source: It will be my honor.
String.Dest: 这将是我的荣幸。

String.Source: It will be my honor.
String.Dest: 这将是我的荣幸。

String.Source: It will be my honor.
String.Dest: 这将是我的荣幸。

String.Source: The Nedes came to Mereth to escape war, not find themselves entrenched in another. However, they are a prideful people.
String.Dest: 内德人来到梅拉斯躲避战火，没想到掉进另一个坑。不过他们还算是群高傲的人。

String.Source: He was the Prince of Solstheim, and he was granted the power of ice and snow.
String.Dest: 他是索瑟姆的王，他被授予冰雪之力。

String.Source: The old Nedic tradition says there is no greater honor than to die in battle, and that is my final request.
String.Dest: 在Nedic的古老传统中，死于战斗之中是至高荣耀，这也是我最后的请求。”

String.Source: The old Nedic tradition says there is no greater honor than to die in battle, and that is my final request.
String.Dest: 在Nedic的古老传统中，死于战斗之中是至高荣耀，这也是我最后的请求。”

String.Source: However, with the Dov-Rha who imbued me with life slain by the Blades, perhaps I will truly find peace.
String.Dest: 尽管如此，有了被刀锋会屠杀的龙魂注入我的身体，也许我会找到真正的安宁。

String.Source: A subject approaches...No, you must not look at me...not like this.
String.Dest: 有试验品来了……不，你不能看着我……这样不行。

String.Source: ...so that someday perhaps, in the great halls where all spirits are laid to rest, we can meet again, and you can know me for who I truly am.
String.Dest: ……有时候会遐想， 在所有灵魂都安葬在那里的大厅中，我们会再度相遇， 那时你会知道一个真正的我。

String.Source: You choose to use humor, but if I laugh, it is only because my sadness has exhausted all tears.
String.Dest: 你想用幽默来逗笑我，但就算我笑了，也只是因为我的悲伤已经耗干了所有的泪。

String.Source: He baited the Mer into an attack on farmers, hunters, and maids.
String.Dest: 他把精灵引诱入一次农民，猎手和女仆们的围攻中。

String.Source: What I do know is my pact with Kodiinaus remained. For I am a Draugr, bound to serve, even as my master is dead.
String.Dest: 我知道我和Kodiinaus的契约仍在继续。因为我是个尸鬼，注定要去服务，即使我的主人已经死了。

String.Source: What I do know is my pact with Kodiinaus remained. For I am a Draugr, bound to serve, even as my master is dead.
String.Dest: 我知道我和Kodiinaus的契约仍在继续。因为我是个尸鬼，注定要去服务，即使我的主人已经死了。

String.Source: That you slay me as you would any nameless Draugr, and that you forget that I was anything else.
String.Dest: 你就像追杀那些无名尸鬼一样地追杀我，你完全忘记了我跟它们是不一样的。

String.Source: That you slay me as you would any nameless Draugr, and that you forget that I was anything else.
String.Dest: 你就像追杀那些无名尸鬼一样地追杀我，你完全忘记了我跟它们是不一样的。

String.Source: To worship does not mean to be enslaved. The dragon priests respected the Dov-rha for their might and power.
String.Dest: 崇拜并不意味着被奴役。而龙祭祀们却就这样臣服在了Dov-rha的力量之下。

String.Source: She was a squire. A girl. Mad with fury and grief for her mother, but still just a girl. So say the tales, but who knows how much is truth.
String.Dest: 她在只是个女孩儿的时候，就当上了护卫。她的妈妈又愤怒又悲伤，但她仍只是个女孩儿。所以说这是个故事，但谁知道有多少是真的呢。

String.Source: Will you grant me this kindness, stranger? My body may resist, but my mind...my voice...it will not shout.
String.Dest: 你能帮我这个忙吗，陌生人？我的躯体也许在抗拒。但我的内心……我的声音……不会叫喊。

String.Source: I understand. Feel free to ask as many as you like, but I hope we can revisit this topic later.
String.Dest: 我懂的。想问多少就问多少吧，但我希望我们先回到这个话题。

String.Source: I was once the envy of all...a queen, Queen Iorel of Mereth, and my subjects averted their gaze out of respect, and not disgust.
String.Dest: 我曾经很羡慕某个女王...那个梅拉斯的柔落女王，我的臣民都是出于尊重而非厌恶来避免与我对视。

String.Source: All that remains of who I am...my beauty, my fears, my heart...lies in this caricature of a human being.
String.Dest: 我曾拥有的一切……我的美丽，我的恐惧，我的心……全都仅剩遗骸，构成了这讽刺画一般的残躯。

String.Source: You make it sound as these are your last days, my champion, when this is just the beginning of what will be a feast of glory.
String.Dest: 你听起来就像是把这当成你最后的日子似的。我的战士，这只是个开始，这终将会是荣誉的盛宴。

String.Source: I am a Draugr. Drah-gkon Servants such as myself are despised for our loyalties, as we are thought to have betrayed man to aid the dragons.
String.Dest: 用你们后辈的话讲，我就是一尸鬼。我们这些侍龙者曾经因我们的忠心饱受鄙视，因为人们认为我们放着好好地人不做跑去跟龙穿一条裤子。

String.Source: The massacre in Saarthal gave Ysgramor the perfect excuse to eradicate the Mer from this land.
String.Dest: 在萨瑟尔城发生的大屠杀给了斯格拉默屠灭精灵族的绝佳借口。

String.Source: Thank you. Your words are unkind, but your actions have mercy, and both are sincere.
String.Dest: 谢谢你，尽管语出不善，但是行为仁慈，而且是发自内心的。

String.Source: Yes, it's a very concise language, but I much rather prefer the elegance of the common tongue.
String.Dest: 是的，这是一种非常简洁的语言，但对我而言，方言的那种优雅感要讨人喜欢得多。

String.Source: You are right. I am everything you say. I am a corpse. A monster.
String.Dest: 你说的对。我就是你说的那样。我是具尸体。一个怪物。

String.Source: Without a Dragon Priest to conduct the rituals, it was left to me to teach my people the old ways.
String.Dest: 没有龙祭司来主持仪式，现在只剩下我来把古老的方式教导给人民了。

String.Source: ...so that someday perhaps, in the great halls where all spirits are laid to rest, we can meet again, and you can know me for who I am.
String.Dest: ...也许有那么一天，这个大厅的所有灵魂都能得以安息，我们也会再次相遇，然后你就能知道我是谁了。

String.Source: Ha! That one means "Die horribly, slave!" What an odd thing to say...
String.Dest: 哈！那个的意思是“死翘翘吧！奴隶！”这话说起来有点诡异啊。

String.Source: When I look back at everything I was, from my flesh to my name, it feels like I am staring at a portrait of someone else's memories.
String.Dest: 当我回顾过去，从我的躯体到我的姓名，那种感觉就像我在盯着别人记忆的肖像。

String.Source: Many great warriors died by his hand, and thus it was the cruelest irony for him to be slain by a child.
String.Dest: 许多伟大的战士都死在他的手上。因此，对他来说，被一个孩子杀死真是莫大的讽刺。

String.Source: Many great warriors died by his hand, and thus it was the cruelest irony for him to be slain by a child.
String.Dest: 许多伟大的战士都死在他的手上。因此，对他来说，被一个孩子杀死真是莫大的讽刺。

String.Source: All the while he and his sons built an army of Companions in the caverns to the north.
String.Dest: 他和他的儿子一直在北面的山洞处为战友团添兵加将。

String.Source: Neither tome nor song will sing my praises, if they sing for me at all.
String.Dest: 即便我的赞歌曾被歌颂过，也再无书本或诗歌让它们继续流传。

String.Source: Thank you. You are both kind and merciful, and while I may be queen, I am humbled by your grace.
String.Dest: 谢谢你。你是如此的宽容而又仁慈，而我虽贵为女王，仍由衷地感激你的慈悲。

String.Source: They say he rode in on a horse of pure white, his armor and spear a beacon of hope in the dark terror of war.
String.Dest: 人们说，他驾着一匹纯白的骏马，身上铠甲与手中长矛的辉光如希望之灯塔，将战争的恐惧斩落。

String.Source: There, on that island to the east, is what remained of the Snow Elf people, and where they would make their final stand.
String.Dest: 那儿，就在那东边的小岛上，是雪精灵族的遗民，也是他们将要做最后一搏的地方。

String.Source: On the ruins of a kingdom. Our kingdom. Ysgramor came as a settler, and stayed as a conqueror. He was a tyrant.
String.Dest: 那是一个王国的遗迹。我们的王国。伊斯格拉谟以移民者之名而来，行之以征服之事。他是个暴君。

String.Source: For the dead can suffer no greater wound, no harsher penalty than the hollows of empty silence.
String.Dest: 死者不可能受到更多的伤害，没有什么惩罚比彻底的寂静更残酷。

String.Source: We paid tribute to them, and in return lived in harmony. In Mereth, no such order had been established.
String.Dest: 我们对他们表达了敬意，生活重归和谐的正轨。在梅拉斯，没可能建立如此的秩序。

String.Source: You know not of our ways. To die in battle brings considerable esteem, but to die against a worthy foe...that is a great and unimpeachable honor.
String.Dest: 你不了解我们的行事方式。战殁者颇受尊重，但死于与强大仇敌的战斗中……则是伟大崇高且毫无置疑之余地的荣誉。

String.Source: Imbued with a new strength, the Prince rode into the Battle of the Moesring, where Ysgramor's armies marched through a field of crimson snow.
String.Dest: 周身注入了全新的力量之后，王子驾着雪白的战马冲进了莫斯林的战阵中。而此时，这里的白雪已被伊斯格拉默军的锋刃染得鲜红。

String.Source: I once had skin that glistened without the aid of oil, and seemed only to grow smoother and softer with age.
String.Dest: 我的皮肤曾经不用抹油也闪闪发光，但似乎这随着年龄的增长而逐渐光滑而柔软了。

String.Source: (Laughs heartily) Do they really say that? "Fear! Stink! Death!" Goodness, is it only me, or am I the only Draugr with half a brain?
String.Dest: （放声笑）他们真的这么说了？“恐惧！腐臭！死亡！”哦天啊，我难道是唯一一个还有点脑子的尸鬼了吗？

String.Source: Yet I was once something more...a queen, Queen Iorel of Mereth, and my subjects averted their gaze out of respect, and not disgust.
String.Dest: 然而我曾更加高贵……我曾是女王，神秘纪元的柔落女王，臣民们不敢忤视我，因为尊敬，而非嫌恶。

String.Source: And it seems I myself am a poor caretaker of that legacy.
String.Dest: 而我，似乎不适合看守遗产。

String.Source: Very well.
String.Dest: 非常好。

String.Source: He swept through the Nedes like a violent gale, felling them one by one in a storm of spears.
String.Dest: 他像是一阵飓风一般横扫过Nedes，在矛锋组成的风暴之中，把他们一个接一个的击倒。

String.Source: I beg you, forget you ever spoke to this rattle of bones, this ugly carcass, this foul, stinking corpse. I ask that you forget who I was...
String.Dest: 我求求你，忘了你曾经对这把喋喋不休的骨头说话的事儿吧，这只是一堆丑陋的残骸，这只是具污秽不堪的，发臭的尸体。请你忘了我是谁吧……

String.Source: I beg you, forget you ever spoke to this rattle of bones, this ugly carcass, this foul, stinking corpse. I ask that you forget who I was...
String.Dest: 我求求你，忘了你曾经对这把喋喋不休的骨头说话的事儿吧，这只是一堆丑陋的残骸，这只是具污秽不堪的，发臭的尸体。请你忘了我是谁吧……

String.Source: The Snow Prince. He swept through the Nedes like a violent gale, felling them one by one in a storm of spears.
String.Dest: 他像是一阵飓风一般横扫过Nedes，在矛锋组成的风暴之中，把他们一个接一个的击倒。

String.Source: Thus my reign lasted no more than a season. All that effort, all the goodwill I had established...shattered by the blade of his inglorious axe.
String.Dest: 因此我的统治不过超过一季。所有的努力，所有我建立起来的名誉……都被他可耻的斧刃砍的支离破碎。

String.Source: I...understand. If by chance you wish to consider, I will be here.
String.Dest: 我……明白。如果你偶然间想要考虑这些，我会一直在这等着你。

String.Source: Queen of Mereth. You speak names from an age long past. This land is Skyrim.
String.Dest: Queen of Mereth. 你提到的是一个来自于远古的名字，而你现在所在的地方是天际。

String.Source: Queen of Mereth. You speak names from an age long past. This land is Skyrim.
String.Dest: Queen of Mereth. 你提到的是一个来自于远古的名字，而你现在所在的地方是天际。

String.Source: Queen of Mereth. You speak names from an age long past. This land is Skyrim.
String.Dest: Queen of Mereth. 你提到的是一个来自于远古的名字，而你现在所在的地方是天际。

String.Source: Queen of Mereth. You speak names from an age long past. This land is Skyrim.
String.Dest: Queen of Mereth. 你提到的是一个来自于远古的名字，而你现在所在的地方是天际。

String.Source: Queen Iorel? Never heard of you.
String.Dest: Iorel皇后? 我从来没听说过你。

String.Source: Queen Iorel? Never heard of you.
String.Dest: Iorel皇后? 我从来没听说过你。

String.Source: My lady, you need not turn away. You are as radiant as ever.
String.Dest: 我的夫人，你不需要离开。你像以往受欢迎。

String.Source: My lady, you need not turn away. You are as radiant as ever.
String.Dest: 我的夫人，你不需要离开。你像以往受欢迎。

String.Source: My lady, you need not turn away. You are as radiant as ever.
String.Dest: 我的夫人，你不需要离开。你像以往受欢迎。

String.Source: What were those early settlements like?
String.Dest: 那些早期的定居点是怎样的?

String.Source: What were those early settlements like?
String.Dest: 那些早期的定居点是怎样的?

String.Source: What were those early settlements like?
String.Dest: 那些早期的定居点是怎样的?

String.Source: What were those early settlements like?
String.Dest: 那些早期的定居点是怎样的?

String.Source: Fine, I'll just have to kill you with my eyes closed.
String.Dest: 好吧，那我只能闭着眼把你给杀了。

String.Source: Fine, I'll just have to kill you with my eyes closed.
String.Dest: 好吧，那我只能闭着眼把你给杀了。

String.Source: So what did you do?
String.Dest: 那么你做了什么？

String.Source: So what did you do?
String.Dest: 那么你做了什么？

String.Source: So what did you do?
String.Dest: 那么你做了什么？

String.Source: I think you are blessed and I am blessed to have met you.
String.Dest: 我想你是幸运的，而我也是幸运的，因为我遇见了你。

String.Source: I think you are blessed and I am blessed to have met you.
String.Dest: 我想你是幸运的，而我也是幸运的，因为我遇见了你。

String.Source: I've never met a Draugr who could talk.
String.Dest: 我从来没有见过会说话的尸鬼。

String.Source: I've never met a Draugr who could talk.
String.Dest: 我从来没有见过会说话的尸鬼。

String.Source: I've never met a Draugr who could talk.
String.Dest: 我从来没有见过会说话的尸鬼。

String.Source: History is written by the victors. Ysgramor's triumph is celebrated by all.
String.Dest: 历史是由胜利者书写的，伊斯格拉谟的胜利值得普天同庆。

String.Source: Your existence would say otherwise.
String.Dest: 不然你的存在会说明一切。

String.Source: Your existence would say otherwise.
String.Dest: 不然你的存在会说明一切。

String.Source: Your existence would say otherwise.
String.Dest: 不然你的存在会说明一切。

String.Source: There are those would kill for such power.
String.Dest: 这是些为权力而杀戮的人。

String.Source: There are those would kill for such power.
String.Dest: 这是些为权力而杀戮的人。

String.Source: There are those would kill for such power.
String.Dest: 这是些为权力而杀戮的人。

String.Source: Can you speak to other Draugr?
String.Dest: 你能和别的尸鬼对话吗?

String.Source: So you settled on occupied land. Some might call that an invasion.
String.Dest: 这么说你们驻扎在了已经被占领的地方。有人恐怕把这会称为侵略。

String.Source: So you settled on occupied land. Some might call that an invasion.
String.Dest: 这么说你们驻扎在了已经被占领的地方。有人恐怕把这会称为侵略。

String.Source: So you settled on occupied land. Some might call that an invasion.
String.Dest: 这么说你们驻扎在了已经被占领的地方。有人恐怕把这会称为侵略。

String.Source: So you settled on occupied land. Some might call that an invasion.
String.Dest: 这么说你们驻扎在了已经被占领的地方。有人恐怕把这会称为侵略。

String.Source: About your request...
String.Dest: 关于你的请求……

String.Source: You're Queen of Mereth? What land is that?
String.Dest: 你是梅拉斯的女王？那是什么地方？

String.Source: You're Queen of Mereth? What land is that?
String.Dest: 你是梅拉斯的女王？那是什么地方？

String.Source: How about "Kren Sos Aal?"
String.Dest: "Kren Sos Aal"怎么样？

String.Source: No, I'd rather you stay alive and suffer like the rest of us.
String.Dest: 不，我更愿意让你活着受苦，就跟我们所有人一样。

String.Source: History says the Mer were threatened by the Nedes, and sought to banish them.
String.Dest: 史料记载，当时的精灵族把“内德人”视为威胁，并试图驱逐他们。

String.Source: History says the Mer were threatened by the Nedes, and sought to banish them.
String.Dest: 史料记载，当时的精灵族把“内德人”视为威胁，并试图驱逐他们。

String.Source: History says the Mer were threatened by the Nedes, and sought to banish them.
String.Dest: 史料记载，当时的精灵族把“内德人”视为威胁，并试图驱逐他们。

String.Source: History says the Mer were threatened by the Nedes, and sought to banish them.
String.Dest: 史料记载，当时的精灵族把“内德人”视为威胁，并试图驱逐他们。

String.Source: History says the Mer were threatened by the Nedes, and sought to banish them.
String.Dest: 史料记载，当时的精灵族把“内德人”视为威胁，并试图驱逐他们。

String.Source: How did you become a Draugr?
String.Dest: 你怎么会变成了尸鬼的？

String.Source: How did you become a Draugr?
String.Dest: 你怎么会变成了尸鬼的？

String.Source: How did you become a Draugr?
String.Dest: 你怎么会变成了尸鬼的？

String.Source: How did you become a Draugr?
String.Dest: 你怎么会变成了尸鬼的？

String.Source: Then the power of the dragons exists inside you.
String.Dest: 这么说那些龙的力量仍在你身体里继续活跃着

String.Source: Then the power of the dragons exists inside you.
String.Dest: 这么说那些龙的力量仍在你身体里继续活跃着

String.Source: Then the power of the dragons exists inside you.
String.Dest: 这么说那些龙的力量仍在你身体里继续活跃着

String.Source: Thus you turned to an even darker influence than war.
String.Dest: 因此，你变成了一个比战争的影响还更加黑暗的存在？

String.Source: Thus you turned to an even darker influence than war.
String.Dest: 因此，你变成了一个比战争的影响还更加黑暗的存在？

String.Source: Thus you turned to an even darker influence than war.
String.Dest: 因此，你变成了一个比战争的影响还更加黑暗的存在？

String.Source: Do you mean to mock me, stranger? Surely you know the name of the land we stand on.
String.Dest: 你在嘲笑我吗, 外地人? 你要清楚我们现在在谁的地盘上。

String.Source: So while I thank you for your words, in my mind they are as empty as I am.
String.Dest: 谢谢你的安慰，但我还是不能释怀。

String.Source: To think that a person's entire existence can be brushed away with the stroke of a quill and the strum of a liar's tongue.
String.Dest: 想象一下，一个人的一切都可以在鹅毛笔或是骗子的巧舌下一笔勾销。

String.Source: I can never again feel the warmth of another, or be able to reward that warmth with a smile.
String.Dest: 我再也不能从另一个人身上感受到这份温暖，并对此回以一个微笑了。

String.Source: I can never again feel the warmth of another, or be able to reward that warmth with a smile.
String.Dest: 我再也不能从另一个人身上感受到这份温暖，并对此回以一个微笑了。

String.Source: Our people learned to cooperate with the Mer, just as we did with the Dov-rha, the dragons whom we worshiped and served.
String.Dest: 我们这些人已经学会了如何跟精灵族相处，就像以前跟那些‘杜瓦’，那些龙族一样，崇拜着，侍奉着。

String.Source: Our people learned to cooperate with the Mer, just as we did with the Dov-rha, the dragons whom we worshiped and served.
String.Dest: 我们这些人已经学会了如何跟精灵族相处，就像以前跟那些‘杜瓦’，那些龙族一样，崇拜着，侍奉着。

String.Source: Slowly we began to establish cities. Some might dare to call it a kingdom.
String.Dest: 慢慢地，我们开始建立城市。有些人可能会敢于把它称为一个王国。

String.Source: Slowly we began to establish cities. Some might dare to call it a kingdom.
String.Dest: 慢慢地，我们开始建立城市。有些人可能会敢于把它称为一个王国。

String.Source: Yes, have you considered what I said? Will you grant me the peace I desire?
String.Dest: 是的,你考虑过我说的话吗?你能授予我渴望已久的和平吗?

String.Source: I have an existence not unlike my previous one, and yet different enough in almost every way that made me human.
String.Dest: 我这条命【not unlike】上一条，而且也和让我成为人类的所有因素都相当的不同。

String.Source: The Mer thought it to be older than the world itself, the all-seeing Eye of the great architect, the blind witness to all of creation. Magnus.
String.Dest: 梅尔认为它比世界本身更加古老， 伟大造物主的全视之眼，盲人见证着所有的创造。 玛格努斯。

String.Source: The same is true for my existence. I am not a Draugr bound to the will of any priest. I have been granted life and speech by a Dov-Rha. A dragon.
String.Dest: 我的存在也是一样真实。我不是被某个祭司驱使的尸鬼。我的生命由杜瓦的言语所赐。杜瓦就是龙！

String.Source: Alone, unguarded, I stole away to the lair of the frost dragon, Kodiinaus, perched atop a spire of stone on a snow-capped hill.
String.Dest: 独自一龙，毫无防备，我在冰霜巨龙的巢穴大偸一番， Kodiinaus歇息在一个在白雪覆盖山上的尖顶的石头上。

String.Source: Alone, unguarded, I stole away to the lair of the frost dragon, Kodiinaus, perched atop a spire of stone on a snow-capped hill.
String.Dest: 独自一龙，毫无防备，我在冰霜巨龙的巢穴大偸一番， Kodiinaus歇息在一个在白雪覆盖山上的尖顶的石头上。

String.Source: It is normally blasphemous for anyone not of the priesthood to use this tongue, but as Queen it was my duty to serve and speak for the Dov-Rha gods.
String.Dest: 一般而言如果不是身为牧师说这样的话就是罪过了，可我作为女皇的职责就是为龙族的神灵服务和代言。

String.Source: Yes, some would call it a blessing. How am I blessed? What sort of madman would call this anything but a curse?
String.Dest: 是的，确实有人会把它叫做祝福。看看我是如何被“祝福”的？只有疯子才不会把它称为诅咒！

String.Source: Yes, some would call it a blessing. How am I blessed? What sort of madman would call this anything but a curse?
String.Dest: 是的，确实有人会把它叫做祝福。看看我是如何被“祝福”的？只有疯子才不会把它称为诅咒！

String.Source: The Draugr exist on but a whisper of life, granted by the word of a Drah-gkon Priest, who themselves were granted eternity by the Dov-rha.
String.Dest: 尸鬼的存在仰赖于稀薄的生命力，这种生命力由龙祭祀们授予，而龙祭祀们本身的不朽又由龙族来保障。

String.Source: So they say, but the truth has a way of mottling even the whitest of lies.
String.Dest: 就如人们所说的，哪怕谎言再苍白，也会给真相蒙上阴影。

String.Source: What I did I did for my people. So that history would not stain their hands in blood. I sought the old alliances. The power of the Dov-Rha.
String.Dest: 什么我做的每件事都是为了我的人民。这样历史就不会把他们沾满鲜血的双手书写上去了。我在寻找盟友。多瓦（龙）的力量。

String.Source: In my time this land was to the south, a land whose winter was far warmer than the summers in Atmora.
String.Dest: 在我的印象中这块土地位于南方，是一块在阿特莫拉冬天远比夏天要暖和得多的土地。

String.Source: I understand their shouts, but they do not comprehend my speech. I can, however, translate their words for you, if you're interested.
String.Dest: 我理解他们的吼叫，但他们却不理解我的话。你要是感兴趣的话，我可以把他们的话翻译给你。

String.Source: Vengeance begets vengeance, and war never ends. Not without the murder of an entire people, the death of a thousand children who committed no crime.
String.Dest: 冤冤相报何时了，争战永不息。不止是普通人被杀，连上千无辜孩童都遇难了。

String.Source: Then came The Night of Tears, and Ysgramor's Return, when all beginnings came to an end, and all ends came for a single beginning.
String.Dest: 然后泪水之夜到来了，而伊斯格拉谟也回归了，所有的开始都迎来了结局，所有的结局都有着同一个开始。

String.Source: Now I am something else entirely. One who lost not only her birthright, but the right to a peaceful and honorable death.
String.Dest: 现在的我已经与过去的自己彻底决裂了。我不只丧失了自己与生俱来的权利，也将无法安详而荣耀地离开这个世界。

String.Source: My people no longer wanted peace. They wanted blood, and even those who were steadfastly loyal to me crowned Ysgramor their leader and king.
String.Dest: 我的人民不再需要和平。他们渴求鲜血，甚至是那些对我忠心耿耿的人也加冕伊斯格拉谟为他们的领导者和国王。

String.Source: I gave myself into his service, for a boon. To imbue a Mer with the powers of Frost. To give their people a chance to survive.
String.Dest: 为了赐福我将自己投身于他的服务事业之中。为了能让精灵获予寒霜之力，为了让他们的人民有机会幸存。

String.Source: I gave myself into his service, for a boon. To imbue a Mer with the powers of Frost. To give their people a chance to survive.
String.Dest: 为了赐福我将自己投身于他的服务事业之中。为了能让精灵获予寒霜之力，为了让他们的人民有机会幸存。

String.Source: What I did I did for my people. So that history would not stain their hands in blood. I sought the old alliances. The power of the Dov-Rha.
String.Dest: 我所做的一切都是为了我的人民。为了不让历史使得他们的双手沾满鲜血。我在寻求故有的盟友。 Dov-Rha的力量。

String.Source: Ah, a most tragic tale, indeed...It was after the Night of Tears, when Ysgramor returned to Mereth with five hundred warriors in tow.
String.Dest: 哦，多么悲壮的故事，确实如此...那是在夜之泪之后的事了，那时伊斯格拉默率领着500勇士重返梅拉斯。

String.Source: As I had led one of the original settlements, and had once trained to become a Dragon Priest, I was chosen as Queen.
String.Dest: 我领导着一只原始部落的时候，曾一度被训练成为一名龙祭司，并被选为了女王。

String.Source: As I had led one of the original settlements, and had once trained to become a Dragon Priest, I was chosen as Queen.
String.Dest: 我领导着一只原始部落的时候，曾一度被训练成为一名龙祭司，并被选为了女王。

String.Source: Ah, it means "Eternal sorrow." Not an uncommon phrase in a land that knows little else.
String.Dest: 哦，它的意思是“永恒的悲痛”。这在一块除此之外几无所知的土地上并不是个罕见的词语。

String.Source: They sought that which was promised to them. A great source of power, a shimmering ball of Magicka, encased in runes of an ancient tongue.
String.Dest: 他们找到了他们承诺要找的东西，一个被用古语写成的符文包裹，充满着巨大力量的闪着淡淡光芒的魔力球体。

String.Source: The Draugr know words of power, but they are not lucid like you and I. They are mindless puppets, doomed to walk the earth as the undead.
String.Dest: 尸鬼懂得言语中所蕴含的力量，但他们不像你我一样清醒。他们是无意识的木偶，注定作为不死生物行走于尘世。

String.Source: There were many who fled south to escape the war, but I led my people here because the crops tended to flourish in lands baked in the sun.
String.Dest: 许多人逃往南方以躲避战火，但我引导我​​的人民到这里，因为庄稼往往在阳光照耀下的土地上生长得更茂盛。

String.Source: I was frustrated. Angry. Were they blind to the truth? Did they learn nothing from the wars in Atmora?
String.Dest: 我感到愤懑不平。他们为什么对真相视而不见？难道他们没有从亚特莫拉的战争中吸取教训吗？

String.Source: If you believe this to be the rim of sky and heaven, then your people have not ventured further north.
String.Dest: 如果你相信这就是天边，就说明你们那儿没人去过更北面了。

String.Source: He who plants kind words grows a garden of friendship, and every day it becomes stronger, every day a new spring.
String.Dest: 他是那种会把亲切的话语种在友情的花园里的人，每天它都长得更好，每天都是一个新的春天。

String.Source: You words disappoint me, but there is a little I can do to persuade one who revels in cruelty. Perhaps another will come who will grant me my wish.
String.Dest: 你说的话让我失望，但是面对陷入残酷的狂欢的人，我还不算完全束手。说不定有人会循我的祈愿而来。

String.Source: Unfortunately I am not surprised. It is a punishment served by historians who find my fate to be a stain on the legacy of our people.
String.Dest: 不幸的是你这个反应我倒是不觉得惊讶。那些历史学家发现我的命运就是我的人民那漫长的历史传承中的一个污点，因而他们对我做出了惩罚。

String.Source: There is no greater jewel, no gem more precious in this world than an act of everyday kindness. Yet no amount of cajoling can change the truth.
String.Dest: 在这个世界上，没有任何珠宝，没有任何宝石能比每天的善举更可贵。然而再多的哄骗也无法改变真相。

String.Source: Yet as to your original question, any conversation I have with Draugr is strictly one way.
String.Dest: 但回到最初的问题上，我和尸鬼的任何一次对话都是条完完全全的单行线。

String.Source: For I am Queen Iorel. The dead Queen Iorel of Mereth.
String.Dest: 因为我是柔落女王. 死去的柔落女王. 那个至高无上却已经死去的梅拉斯的柔落女王.

String.Source: Those who migrated here named this land Mereth, in honor of the Mer who called it home.
String.Dest: 那些移民到此的人把这命名为梅拉斯, 以此纪念这里的原住民梅尔.

String.Source: Not even the wind deigns to acknowledge my presence. It passes through my body like a cold shoulder.
String.Dest: 即使风屈尊承认我的存在。它吹过我的身体时我也就像吃了一个闭门羹一样。

String.Source: Not even the wind deigns to acknowledge my presence. It passes through my body like a cold shoulder.
String.Dest: 即使风屈尊承认我的存在。它吹过我的身体时我也就像吃了一个闭门羹一样。

String.Source: Typical spoiled royalty. So you've lost some weight. You're still alive.
String.Dest: 典型被宠坏的皇室，减减肥不会死。

String.Source: Typical spoiled royalty. So you've lost some weight. You're still alive.
String.Dest: 典型被宠坏的皇室，减减肥不会死。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: What if I slew you? Would you be able to rest?
String.Dest: 我杀了你如何？你会安息吗？

String.Source: What if I slew you? Would you be able to rest?
String.Dest: 我杀了你如何？你会安息吗？

String.Source: What if I slew you? Would you be able to rest?
String.Dest: 我杀了你如何？你会安息吗？

String.Source: Tell me what "Qiilaan Us Dilon" means.
String.Dest: 跟我说说"Qiilaan Us Dilon"是什么意思。

String.Source: Siding with the Elves was the hard thing. And the honorable one.
String.Dest: 与精灵为伍很难得，也很光荣。

String.Source: You have your mind. Be thankful for that when others are ash and dust.
String.Dest: 当他人化为尘土时感谢自己把握好自己吧

String.Source: As Queen of Mereth, you must have dealt with the Snow Elves.
String.Dest: Mereth王后，你必须处理这些雪精灵。.

String.Source: As Queen of Mereth, you must have dealt with the Snow Elves.
String.Dest: Mereth王后，你必须处理这些雪精灵。.

String.Source: As Queen of Mereth, you must have dealt with the Snow Elves.
String.Dest: Mereth王后，你必须处理这些雪精灵。.

String.Source: As Queen of Mereth, you must have dealt with the Snow Elves.
String.Dest: Mereth王后，你必须处理这些雪精灵。.

String.Source: Can you speak to other Draugr?
String.Dest: 你能和别的尸鬼对话吗?

String.Source: Can you speak to other Draugr?
String.Dest: 你能和别的尸鬼对话吗?

String.Source: It was the hardest thing I have ever done. Yet as Queen, my duty was always to protect my people. Even if it meant from themselves.
String.Dest: 这是我做过的最难的事。然而，作为女王，我的职责是保护我的人民。即使这意味着我要从他们自己的手里保护他们。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: I...I do not know. Many Draugr who are slain rise again, but only because they are granted life by the priests they serve.
String.Dest: 我……我不知道。许多被杀的尸鬼都会死而复生。但只是因为他们被那些他们服务着的祭司再次赋予了生命。

String.Source: Will you grant me this kindness, stranger? My body may resist, but my mind...my voice...it will not shout.
String.Dest: 你能发发慈悲吗，陌生人？我的身体会抗拒，但我的心……我的声音……不会【喊叫】。

String.Source: Some believe the Draugr are cannibals for whom this existence is a penalty. Others believe they are thought cursed for betraying mankind.
String.Dest: 一些人相信尸鬼是对同类相食者的惩罚，而另一些则认为它们是受到诅咒的背叛者。

String.Source: Their bodies are indeed ash and dust, but their spirits live on. How I long for the same.
String.Dest: 他们的肉体已化为尘埃，但他们的精神依旧存在。我多么渴望可以和他们一样啊。

String.Source: And it wasn't just for my own people. If I shed my pride and spoke the Elven tongue, perhaps they too would be willing to embrace our customs.
String.Dest: 这不仅仅是对我的子民而言的。如果我不再坚持着自己的所谓荣耀，并选择说精灵语，或许他们就会愿意接受我们的习俗。

String.Source: The Dov-Rha who imbued me with life was slain many centuries ago, and with him gone, perhaps I too can finally rest.
String.Dest: 那个用生命来感染我的多瓦在很多世纪以前就被杀了，随着他的逝去，也许我终于能休息了。

String.Source: In truth, the Draugr are simply dead bones, brought to animation by the power of the Dov-Rha, but not to life.
String.Dest: 事实上，这些尸鬼只不过是死人骨头，因多瓦之力而苏醒过来而已，但却早就死得不能再死了。

String.Source: For our people, the spoken word is a powerful weapon. One that can lead an army. Yet by adopting another's word, I chose to lead by example.
String.Dest: 对于我们的人民来说，话语就是强力的武器。这武器能领导一支军队。因而我愿接受另一句话语来以身作则。

String.Source: Goodbye stranger, and thank you. May the wind forever be on your back, and kindness forever in your heart.
String.Dest: 再见陌生人，谢谢你。五月的清风永远索绕在你身边，善良之意永远驻扎于你的心头。

String.Source: We shared resources. Knowledge. And to bridge this gap, I abandoned the old Nedic tongue in order to ensure nothing would be lost in translation.
String.Dest: 我们共享资源，共享知识。为了消除我们之间的隔阂，我抛弃了古诺迪克语以使得在语言互译时保持信息的完整。

String.Source: Well, "Qiilaan" means "Bow" and "Dilon" means "Die". I would assume that the phrase means something like "Bow to me or die!"
String.Dest: 呃，"Qiilaan" 的意思是 "弯腰" ，而 "Dilon" 的意思是"死亡"。我认为这句话的意思有点像是 "要么弯腰，要么死！"

String.Source: But I am not a person, am I. I am a Draugr, and try as I might, I cannot convince myself otherwise.
String.Dest: (叹息)但我不是一个人，对吗。我是个尸鬼。不管我作何尝试，都无法说服自己。

String.Source: Must you mock me in my current state? Queen or pauper, I am still a person. I did not think I would live to see the death of common decency.
String.Dest: 你非要嘲笑我的现状么。不管是女皇还是乞丐，我都是个人。我从没想过我会有这么落魄的一天.

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。
